About Grayson Caroll

Second-generation local jeweler dedicated to craftsmanship and quality.

Grayson Caroll grew up in his father's workshop, where he developed a deep appreciation for the art of creating timeless jewelry. His work combines traditional techniques with modern design, resulting in pieces that are both unique and elegant.
